channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Oura Ring 4 Is $100 Off Ahead of Black Friday
item.description: This sophisticated smart ring is marked down to just $249, and it tracks a ton of health data.

item.title: AWS is spending $50B build AI infrastructure for the US government
item.description: AWS has been working with the U.S. government since 2011 and is now building AI infrastructure specifically for the entity.

item.title: Hands on with Stickerbox, the AI-powered sticker maker for kids
item.description: Stickerbox turns kids’ ideas into printable stickers, blending AI magic with hands-on coloring for a surprisingly creative, "screen-light" play experi...

item.title: Tesla FSD software may not be approved by EU regulator after all
item.description: Tesla claimed in a weekend social media post that a Dutch regulator was set to approve its Full Self-Driving mode. It seems the regulator isn't quite ...

item.title: Rad Power Bikes’ batteries receive major fire risk warning
item.description: The U.S Consumer Product Safety Commission claims Rad Power "refused to agree to an acceptable recall." Rad Power says the CPSC's solution would bankr...

item.title: Herman Miller Is Having a Surprise Flash Sale on Office Chairs
item.description: Early Black Friday discounts—and a flash sale—help bring down the price of the iconic Herman Miller Aeron.

item.title: Our Favorite Unbound Merino Wool T-Shirts Are on Sale for Black Friday
item.description: WIRED's pick for the best travel T-shirt is on sale for Black Friday. Expand your merino wardrobe with these deals.

item.title: 7 Best OLED TVs (2025): Sony, LG, Samsung, and More
item.description: Looking to step up to the TV big leagues? These are the best OLED TVs you can buy.

item.title: Analogue3D Review: A Retro Gamer’s Dream
item.description: This is the best way to play classic N64 games in 2025.

item.title: Anthropic releases Opus 4.5 with new Chrome and Excel integrations
item.description: Anthropic has launched Opus 4.5, the latest version of its flagship model, with new integrations into Chrome and Excel.
